Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the invertebrate defensin family (Type 1 subfamil
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.10561605] Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus (MIC=25 µg/ml), Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) (MIC>50 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli (MIC=25 µg/ml), Pseudomonas aeruginosa (MIC>50 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.10561605] Had no hemolytic activity against rabbit erythrocytes
Sequence Information.Function: Shows very strong activity against Staphylococcus aureus. Has no hemolytic activity.

Literature.Title: Purification, cDNA cloning and modification of a defensin from the coconut rhinoceros beetle, Oryctes rhinoceros.
Literature.Author: Ishibashi J, Yang J, Saido-Sakanaka H, Nakazawa H, Yamamoto M, Yamakawa M.
